attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British National security is a world wide joke with the likes of Plane Stupid and Fathers 4 Justice exploiting security breaches on an almost daily basis. 
The SIA or Seriously Incompetent Authority as I like to call it only adds even more shame to British Security.
We at AASIA (Action Against the SIA) want the whole SIA (Security Industry Authority) to be transformed to an authority Britain can be proud of!

We want... 

1)The outrageous SIA application fee to be reduced to a fair level.

2)The SIA waiting lists to be guaranteed less than 4 weeks to complete the whole process from the date of receiving a correct application form till posting out the license badge.

3)All documents sent to the SIA to be returned within 2 weeks via recorded delivery.

4)An investigation into the countless emails the SIA receive and never even read!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
